Package soc.gwtClient.game.widgetsInterface.visuals Description

Keeps all the visuals for every specific web graphics technology. AbstractVisuals keeps a list of interfaces and their abstract implementations, such that lots of logic can be reused. This reusing of logic mainly happens in the behaviour package, where board and gameboard behaviour is defined for various types of interaction behaviour with the player. A canvas of WebGL implementation thus only needs to subclass the Abstract*Visual classes. Interaction behaviour then will be consistent whether an svg, canvas or webgl technology is used to render a board or a gameboard.
